109const struct window_mode window_copy_mode = {
110 .name = "copy-mode",
111
112 .init = window_copy_init,
113 .free = window_copy_free,
114 .resize = window_copy_resize,
115 .key_table = window_copy_key_table,
116 .command = window_copy_command,
117};
118
119enum {
120 WINDOW_COPY_OFF,
121 WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHUP,
122 WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHDOWN,
123 WINDOW_COPY_JUMPFORWARD,
124 WINDOW_COPY_JUMPBACKWARD,
125 WINDOW_COPY_JUMPTOFORWARD,
126 WINDOW_COPY_JUMPTOBACKWARD,
127};
128
129enum {
130 WINDOW_COPY_REL_POS_ABOVE,
131 WINDOW_COPY_REL_POS_ON_SCREEN,
132 WINDOW_COPY_REL_POS_BELOW,
133};
134
135/*
136 * Copy mode's visible screen (the "screen" field) is filled from one of two
137 * sources: the original contents of the pane (used when we actually enter via
138 * the "copy-mode" command, to copy the contents of the current pane), or else
139 * a series of lines containing the output from an output-writing tmux command
140 * (such as any of the "show-*" or "list-*" commands).
141 *
142 * In either case, the full content of the copy-mode grid is pointed at by the
143 * "backing" field, and is copied into "screen" as needed (that is, when
144 * scrolling occurs). When copy-mode is backed by a pane, backing points
145 * directly at that pane's screen structure (&wp->base); when backed by a list
146 * of output-lines from a command, it points at a newly-allocated screen
147 * structure (which is deallocated when the mode ends).
148 */
149struct window_copy_mode_data {
150 struct screen screen;
151
152 struct screen *backing;
153 int backing_written; /* backing display started */
154
155 u_int oy; /* number of lines scrolled up */
156
157 u_int selx; /* beginning of selection */
158 u_int sely;
159
160 u_int endselx; /* end of selection */
161 u_int endsely;
162
163 enum {
164 CURSORDRAG_NONE, /* selection is independent of cursor */
165 CURSORDRAG_ENDSEL, /* end is synchronized with cursor */
166 CURSORDRAG_SEL, /* start is synchronized with cursor */
167 } cursordrag;
168
169 int modekeys;
170 enum {
171 LINE_SEL_NONE,
172 LINE_SEL_LEFT_RIGHT,
173 LINE_SEL_RIGHT_LEFT,
174 } lineflag; /* line selection mode */
175 int rectflag; /* in rectangle copy mode? */
176 int scroll_exit; /* exit on scroll to end? */
177
178 u_int cx;
179 u_int cy;
180
181 u_int lastcx; /* position in last line w/ content */
182 u_int lastsx; /* size of last line w/ content */
183
184 int searchtype;
185 char *searchstr;
186 bitstr_t *searchmark;
187 u_int searchcount;
188 int searchthis;
189 int searchx;
190 int searchy;
191 int searcho;
192
193 int jumptype;
194 char jumpchar;
195};
196
197static struct screen *
198window_copy_init(struct window_pane *wp, __unused struct cmd_find_state *fs,
199 __unused struct args *args)
200{
201 struct window_copy_mode_data *data;
202 struct screen *s;
203
204 wp->modedata = data = xcalloc(1, sizeof *data);
205
206 data->cursordrag = CURSORDRAG_NONE;
207 data->lineflag = LINE_SEL_NONE;
208
209 if (wp->searchstr != NULL) {
210 data->searchtype = WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHUP;
211 data->searchstr = xstrdup(wp->searchstr);
212 } else {
213 data->searchtype = WINDOW_COPY_OFF;
214 data->searchstr = NULL;
215 }
216 data->searchmark = NULL;
217 data->searchx = data->searchy = data->searcho = -1;
218
219 if (wp->fd != -1)
220 bufferevent_disable(wp->event, EV_READ|EV_WRITE);
221
222 data->jumptype = WINDOW_COPY_OFF;
223 data->jumpchar = '\0';
224
225 s = &data->screen;
226 screen_init(s, screen_size_x(&wp->base), screen_size_y(&wp->base), 0);
227 data->modekeys = options_get_number(wp->window->options, "mode-keys");
228
229 data->backing = NULL;
230
231 return (s);
232}
233
234void
235window_copy_init_from_pane(struct window_pane *wp, int scroll_exit)
236{
237 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
238 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
239 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
240 u_int i;
241
242 if (wp->mode != &window_copy_mode)
243 fatalx("not in copy mode");
244
245 data->backing = &wp->base;
246 data->cx = data->backing->cx;
247 data->cy = data->backing->cy;
248 data->scroll_exit = scroll_exit;
249
250 s->cx = data->cx;
251 s->cy = data->cy;
252
253 screen_write_start(&ctx, NULL, s);
254 for (i = 0; i < screen_size_y(s); i++)
255 window_copy_write_line(wp, &ctx, i);
256 screen_write_cursormove(&ctx, data->cx, data->cy);
257 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
258}
259
260void
261window_copy_init_for_output(struct window_pane *wp)
262{
263 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
264
265 data->backing = xmalloc(sizeof *data->backing);
266 screen_init(data->backing, screen_size_x(&wp->base),
267 screen_size_y(&wp->base), UINT_MAX);
268}
269
270static void
271window_copy_free(struct window_pane *wp)
272{
273 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
274
275 if (wp->fd != -1)
276 bufferevent_enable(wp->event, EV_READ|EV_WRITE);
277
278 free(data->searchmark);
279 free(data->searchstr);
280
281 if (data->backing != &wp->base) {
282 screen_free(data->backing);
283 free(data->backing);
284 }
285 screen_free(&data->screen);
286
287 free(data);
288}
289
290void
291window_copy_add(struct window_pane *wp, const char *fmt, ...)
292{
293 va_list ap;
294
295 va_start(ap, fmt);
296 window_copy_vadd(wp, fmt, ap);
297 va_end(ap);
298}
299
300void
301window_copy_vadd(struct window_pane *wp, const char *fmt, va_list ap)
302{
303 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
304 struct screen *backing = data->backing;
305 struct screen_write_ctx back_ctx, ctx;
306 struct grid_cell gc;
307 u_int old_hsize, old_cy;
308
309 if (backing == &wp->base)
310 return;
311
312 memcpy(&gc, &grid_default_cell, sizeof gc);
313
314 old_hsize = screen_hsize(data->backing);
315 screen_write_start(&back_ctx, NULL, backing);
316 if (data->backing_written) {
317 /*
318 * On the second or later line, do a CRLF before writing
319 * (so it's on a new line).
320 */
321 screen_write_carriagereturn(&back_ctx);
322 screen_write_linefeed(&back_ctx, 0, 8);
323 } else
324 data->backing_written = 1;
325 old_cy = backing->cy;
326 screen_write_vnputs(&back_ctx, 0, &gc, fmt, ap);
327 screen_write_stop(&back_ctx);
328
329 data->oy += screen_hsize(data->backing) - old_hsize;
330
331 screen_write_start(&ctx, wp, &data->screen);
332
333 /*
334 * If the history has changed, draw the top line.
335 * (If there's any history at all, it has changed.)
336 */
337 if (screen_hsize(data->backing))
338 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, 0, 1);
339
340 /* Write the new lines. */
341 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, old_cy, backing->cy - old_cy + 1);
342
343 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
344}
345
346void
347window_copy_pageup(struct window_pane *wp, int half_page)
348{
349 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
350 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
351 u_int n, ox, oy, px, py;
352
353 oy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
354 ox = window_copy_find_length(wp, oy);
355
356 if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_LEFT_RIGHT && oy == data->sely)
357 window_copy_other_end(wp);
358
359 if (data->cx != ox) {
360 data->lastcx = data->cx;
361 data->lastsx = ox;
362 }
363 data->cx = data->lastcx;
364
365 n = 1;
366 if (screen_size_y(s) > 2) {
367 if (half_page)
368 n = screen_size_y(s) / 2;
369 else
370 n = screen_size_y(s) - 2;
371 }
372
373 if (data->oy + n > screen_hsize(data->backing))
374 data->oy = screen_hsize(data->backing);
375 else
376 data->oy += n;
377
378 if (data->screen.sel == NULL || !data->rectflag) {
379 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
380 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
381 if ((data->cx >= data->lastsx && data->cx != px) ||
382 data->cx > px)
383 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
384 }
385
386 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
387 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
388}
389
390static int
391window_copy_pagedown(struct window_pane *wp, int half_page, int scroll_exit)
392{
393 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
394 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
395 u_int n, ox, oy, px, py;
396
397 oy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
398 ox = window_copy_find_length(wp, oy);
399
400 if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_RIGHT_LEFT && oy == data->sely)
401 window_copy_other_end(wp);
402
403 if (data->cx != ox) {
404 data->lastcx = data->cx;
405 data->lastsx = ox;
406 }
407 data->cx = data->lastcx;
408
409 n = 1;
410 if (screen_size_y(s) > 2) {
411 if (half_page)
412 n = screen_size_y(s) / 2;
413 else
414 n = screen_size_y(s) - 2;
415 }
416
417 if (data->oy < n)
418 data->oy = 0;
419 else
420 data->oy -= n;
421
422 if (data->screen.sel == NULL || !data->rectflag) {
423 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
424 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
425 if ((data->cx >= data->lastsx && data->cx != px) ||
426 data->cx > px)
427 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
428 }
429
430 if (scroll_exit && data->oy == 0)
431 return (1);
432 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
433 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
434 return (0);
435}
436
437static void
438window_copy_previous_paragraph(struct window_pane *wp)
439{
440 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
441 u_int oy;
442
443 oy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
444
445 while (oy > 0 && window_copy_find_length(wp, oy) == 0)
446 oy--;
447
448 while (oy > 0 && window_copy_find_length(wp, oy) > 0)
449 oy--;
450
451 window_copy_scroll_to(wp, 0, oy);
452}
453
454static void
455window_copy_next_paragraph(struct window_pane *wp)
456{
457 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
458 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
459 u_int maxy, ox, oy;
460
461 oy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
462 maxy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + screen_size_y(s) - 1;
463
464 while (oy < maxy && window_copy_find_length(wp, oy) == 0)
465 oy++;
466
467 while (oy < maxy && window_copy_find_length(wp, oy) > 0)
468 oy++;
469
470 ox = window_copy_find_length(wp, oy);
471 window_copy_scroll_to(wp, ox, oy);
472}
473
474static void
475window_copy_resize(struct window_pane *wp, u_int sx, u_int sy)
476{
477 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
478 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
479 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
480
481 screen_resize(s, sx, sy, 1);
482 if (data->backing != &wp->base)
483 screen_resize(data->backing, sx, sy, 1);
484
485 if (data->cy > sy - 1)
486 data->cy = sy - 1;
487 if (data->cx > sx)
488 data->cx = sx;
489 if (data->oy > screen_hsize(data->backing))
490 data->oy = screen_hsize(data->backing);
491
492 window_copy_clear_selection(wp);
493
494 screen_write_start(&ctx, NULL, s);
495 window_copy_write_lines(wp, &ctx, 0, screen_size_y(s) - 1);
496 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
497
498 if (data->searchmark != NULL)
499 window_copy_search_marks(wp, NULL);
500 data->searchx = data->cx;
501 data->searchy = data->cy;
502 data->searcho = data->oy;
503
504 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
505}
506
507static const char *
508window_copy_key_table(struct window_pane *wp)
509{
510 if (options_get_number(wp->window->options, "mode-keys") == MODEKEY_VI)
511 return ("copy-mode-vi");
512 return ("copy-mode");
513}
514
515static void
516window_copy_command(struct window_pane *wp, struct client *c, struct session *s,
517 struct args *args, struct mouse_event *m)
518{
519 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
520 struct screen *sn = &data->screen;
521 const char *command, *argument, *ws;
522 u_int np = wp->modeprefix;
523 int cancel = 0, redraw = 0, scroll_exit;
524 char prefix;
525
526 if (args->argc == 0)
527 return;
528 command = args->argv[0];
529
530 if (m != NULL && m->valid)
531 window_copy_move_mouse(m);
532
533 if (args->argc == 1) {
534 if (strcmp(command, "append-selection") == 0) {
535 if (s != NULL)
536 window_copy_append_selection(wp, NULL);
537 window_copy_clear_selection(wp);
538 redraw = 1;
539 }
540 if (strcmp(command, "append-selection-and-cancel") == 0) {
541 if (s != NULL)
542 window_copy_append_selection(wp, NULL);
543 window_copy_clear_selection(wp);
544 redraw = 1;
545 cancel = 1;
546 }
547 if (strcmp(command, "back-to-indentation") == 0)
548 window_copy_cursor_back_to_indentation(wp);
549 if (strcmp(command, "begin-selection") == 0) {
550 if (m != NULL)
551 window_copy_start_drag(c, m);
552 else {
553 data->lineflag = LINE_SEL_NONE;
554 window_copy_start_selection(wp);
555 redraw = 1;
556 }
557 }
558 if (strcmp(command, "stop-selection") == 0)
559 data->cursordrag = CURSORDRAG_NONE;
560 if (strcmp(command, "bottom-line") == 0) {
561 data->cx = 0;
562 data->cy = screen_size_y(sn) - 1;
563 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
564 redraw = 1;
565 }
566 if (strcmp(command, "cancel") == 0)
567 cancel = 1;
568 if (strcmp(command, "clear-selection") == 0) {
569 window_copy_clear_selection(wp);
570 redraw = 1;
571 }
572 if (strcmp(command, "copy-end-of-line") == 0) {
573 window_copy_start_selection(wp);
574 for (; np > 1; np--)
575 window_copy_cursor_down(wp, 0);
576 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
577 redraw = 1;
578
579 if (s != NULL) {
580 window_copy_copy_selection(wp, NULL);
581 cancel = 1;
582 }
583 }
584 if (strcmp(command, "copy-line") == 0) {
585 window_copy_cursor_start_of_line(wp);
586 window_copy_start_selection(wp);
587 for (; np > 1; np--)
588 window_copy_cursor_down(wp, 0);
589 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
590 redraw = 1;
591
592 if (s != NULL) {
593 window_copy_copy_selection(wp, NULL);
594 cancel = 1;
595 }
596 }
597 if (strcmp(command, "copy-selection") == 0) {
598 if (s != NULL)
599 window_copy_copy_selection(wp, NULL);
600 window_copy_clear_selection(wp);
601 redraw = 1;
602 }
603 if (strcmp(command, "copy-selection-and-cancel") == 0) {
604 if (s != NULL)
605 window_copy_copy_selection(wp, NULL);
606 window_copy_clear_selection(wp);
607 redraw = 1;
608 cancel = 1;
609 }
610 if (strcmp(command, "cursor-down") == 0) {
611 for (; np != 0; np--)
612 window_copy_cursor_down(wp, 0);
613 }
614 if (strcmp(command, "cursor-left") == 0) {
615 for (; np != 0; np--)
616 window_copy_cursor_left(wp);
617 }
618 if (strcmp(command, "cursor-right") == 0) {
619 for (; np != 0; np--)
620 window_copy_cursor_right(wp);
621 }
622 if (strcmp(command, "cursor-up") == 0) {
623 for (; np != 0; np--)
624 window_copy_cursor_up(wp, 0);
625 }
626 if (strcmp(command, "end-of-line") == 0)
627 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
628 if (strcmp(command, "halfpage-down") == 0 ||
629 strcmp(command, "halfpage-down-and-cancel") == 0) {
630 if (strcmp(command, "halfpage-down-and-cancel") == 0)
631 scroll_exit = 1;
632 else
633 scroll_exit = data->scroll_exit;
634 for (; np != 0; np--) {
635 if (window_copy_pagedown(wp, 1, scroll_exit)) {
636 cancel = 1;
637 break;
638 }
639 }
640 }
641 if (strcmp(command, "halfpage-up") == 0) {
642 for (; np != 0; np--)
643 window_copy_pageup(wp, 1);
644 }
645 if (strcmp(command, "history-bottom") == 0) {
646 data->cx = 0;
647 data->cy = screen_size_y(sn) - 1;
648 data->oy = 0;
649 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
650 redraw = 1;
651 }
652 if (strcmp(command, "history-top") == 0) {
653 data->cx = 0;
654 data->cy = 0;
655 data->oy = screen_hsize(data->backing);
656 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
657 redraw = 1;
658 }
659 if (strcmp(command, "jump-again") == 0) {
660 switch (data->jumptype) {
661 case WINDOW_COPY_JUMPFORWARD:
662 for (; np != 0; np--)
663 window_copy_cursor_jump(wp);
664 break;
665 case WINDOW_COPY_JUMPBACKWARD:
666 for (; np != 0; np--)
667 window_copy_cursor_jump_back(wp);
668 break;
669 case WINDOW_COPY_JUMPTOFORWARD:
670 for (; np != 0; np--)
671 window_copy_cursor_jump_to(wp);
672 break;
673 case WINDOW_COPY_JUMPTOBACKWARD:
674 for (; np != 0; np--)
675 window_copy_cursor_jump_to_back(wp);
676 break;
677 }
678 }
679 if (strcmp(command, "jump-reverse") == 0) {
680 switch (data->jumptype) {
681 case WINDOW_COPY_JUMPFORWARD:
682 for (; np != 0; np--)
683 window_copy_cursor_jump_back(wp);
684 break;
685 case WINDOW_COPY_JUMPBACKWARD:
686 for (; np != 0; np--)
687 window_copy_cursor_jump(wp);
688 break;
689 case WINDOW_COPY_JUMPTOFORWARD:
690 for (; np != 0; np--)
691 window_copy_cursor_jump_to_back(wp);
692 break;
693 case WINDOW_COPY_JUMPTOBACKWARD:
694 for (; np != 0; np--)
695 window_copy_cursor_jump_to(wp);
696 break;
697 }
698 }
699 if (strcmp(command, "middle-line") == 0) {
700 data->cx = 0;
701 data->cy = (screen_size_y(sn) - 1) / 2;
702 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
703 redraw = 1;
704 }
705 if (strcmp(command, "next-paragraph") == 0) {
706 for (; np != 0; np--)
707 window_copy_next_paragraph(wp);
708 }
709 if (strcmp(command, "next-space") == 0) {
710 for (; np != 0; np--)
711 window_copy_cursor_next_word(wp, " ");
712 }
713 if (strcmp(command, "next-space-end") == 0) {
714 for (; np != 0; np--)
715 window_copy_cursor_next_word_end(wp, " ");
716 }
717 if (strcmp(command, "next-word") == 0) {
718 ws = options_get_string(s->options, "word-separators");
719 for (; np != 0; np--)
720 window_copy_cursor_next_word(wp, ws);
721 }
722 if (strcmp(command, "next-word-end") == 0) {
723 ws = options_get_string(s->options, "word-separators");
724 for (; np != 0; np--)
725 window_copy_cursor_next_word_end(wp, ws);
726 }
727 if (strcmp(command, "other-end") == 0) {
728 if ((np % 2) != 0)
729 window_copy_other_end(wp);
730 }
731 if (strcmp(command, "page-down") == 0 ||
732 strcmp(command, "page-down-and-cancel") == 0) {
733 if (strcmp(command, "page-down-and-cancel") == 0)
734 scroll_exit = 1;
735 else
736 scroll_exit = data->scroll_exit;
737 for (; np != 0; np--) {
738 if (window_copy_pagedown(wp, 0, scroll_exit)) {
739 cancel = 1;
740 break;
741 }
742 }
743 }
744 if (strcmp(command, "page-up") == 0) {
745 for (; np != 0; np--)
746 window_copy_pageup(wp, 0);
747 }
748 if (strcmp(command, "previous-paragraph") == 0) {
749 for (; np != 0; np--)
750 window_copy_previous_paragraph(wp);
751 }
752 if (strcmp(command, "previous-space") == 0) {
753 for (; np != 0; np--)
754 window_copy_cursor_previous_word(wp, " ");
755 }
756 if (strcmp(command, "previous-word") == 0) {
757 ws = options_get_string(s->options, "word-separators");
758 for (; np != 0; np--)
759 window_copy_cursor_previous_word(wp, ws);
760 }
761 if (strcmp(command, "rectangle-toggle") == 0) {
762 data->lineflag = LINE_SEL_NONE;
763 window_copy_rectangle_toggle(wp);
764 }
765 if (strcmp(command, "scroll-down") == 0 ||
766 strcmp(command, "scroll-down-and-cancel") == 0) {
767 if (strcmp(command, "scroll-down-and-cancel") == 0)
768 scroll_exit = 1;
769 else
770 scroll_exit = data->scroll_exit;
771 for (; np != 0; np--)
772 window_copy_cursor_down(wp, 1);
773 if (scroll_exit && data->oy == 0)
774 cancel = 1;
775 }
776 if (strcmp(command, "scroll-up") == 0) {
777 for (; np != 0; np--)
778 window_copy_cursor_up(wp, 1);
779 }
780 if (strcmp(command, "search-again") == 0) {
781 if (data->searchtype == WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHUP) {
782 for (; np != 0; np--)
783 window_copy_search_up(wp);
784 } else if (data->searchtype == WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHDOWN) {
785 for (; np != 0; np--)
786 window_copy_search_down(wp);
787 }
788 }
789 if (strcmp(command, "search-reverse") == 0) {
790 if (data->searchtype == WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHUP) {
791 for (; np != 0; np--)
792 window_copy_search_down(wp);
793 } else if (data->searchtype == WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHDOWN) {
794 for (; np != 0; np--)
795 window_copy_search_up(wp);
796 }
797 }
798 if (strcmp(command, "select-line") == 0) {
799 data->lineflag = LINE_SEL_LEFT_RIGHT;
800 data->rectflag = 0;
801 window_copy_cursor_start_of_line(wp);
802 window_copy_start_selection(wp);
803 for (; np > 1; np--)
804 window_copy_cursor_down(wp, 0);
805 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
806 redraw = 1;
807 }
808 if (strcmp(command, "select-word") == 0) {
809 data->lineflag = LINE_SEL_LEFT_RIGHT;
810 data->rectflag = 0;
811 ws = options_get_string(s->options, "word-separators");
812 window_copy_cursor_previous_word(wp, ws);
813 window_copy_start_selection(wp);
814 window_copy_cursor_next_word_end(wp, ws);
815 redraw = 1;
816 }
817 if (strcmp(command, "start-of-line") == 0)
818 window_copy_cursor_start_of_line(wp);
819 if (strcmp(command, "top-line") == 0) {
820 data->cx = 0;
821 data->cy = 0;
822 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
823 redraw = 1;
824 }
825 } else if (args->argc == 2 && *args->argv[1] != '\0') {
826 argument = args->argv[1];
827 if (strcmp(command, "copy-pipe") == 0) {
828 if (s != NULL)
829 window_copy_copy_pipe(wp, s, NULL, argument);
830 }
831 if (strcmp(command, "copy-pipe-and-cancel") == 0) {
832 if (s != NULL) {
833 window_copy_copy_pipe(wp, s, NULL, argument);
834 cancel = 1;
835 }
836 }
837 if (strcmp(command, "goto-line") == 0)
838 window_copy_goto_line(wp, argument);
839 if (strcmp(command, "jump-backward") == 0) {
840 data->jumptype = WINDOW_COPY_JUMPBACKWARD;
841 data->jumpchar = *argument;
842 for (; np != 0; np--)
843 window_copy_cursor_jump_back(wp);
844 }
845 if (strcmp(command, "jump-forward") == 0) {
846 data->jumptype = WINDOW_COPY_JUMPFORWARD;
847 data->jumpchar = *argument;
848 for (; np != 0; np--)
849 window_copy_cursor_jump(wp);
850 }
851 if (strcmp(command, "jump-to-backward") == 0) {
852 data->jumptype = WINDOW_COPY_JUMPTOBACKWARD;
853 data->jumpchar = *argument;
854 for (; np != 0; np--)
855 window_copy_cursor_jump_to_back(wp);
856 }
857 if (strcmp(command, "jump-to-forward") == 0) {
858 data->jumptype = WINDOW_COPY_JUMPTOFORWARD;
859 data->jumpchar = *argument;
860 for (; np != 0; np--)
861 window_copy_cursor_jump_to(wp);
862 }
863 if (strcmp(command, "search-backward") == 0) {
864 data->searchtype = WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHUP;
865 free(data->searchstr);
866 data->searchstr = xstrdup(argument);
867 for (; np != 0; np--)
868 window_copy_search_up(wp);
869 }
870 if (strcmp(command, "search-forward") == 0) {
871 data->searchtype = WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHDOWN;
872 free(data->searchstr);
873 data->searchstr = xstrdup(argument);
874 for (; np != 0; np--)
875 window_copy_search_down(wp);
876 }
877 if (strcmp(command, "search-backward-incremental") == 0) {
878 prefix = *argument++;
879 if (data->searchx == -1 || data->searchy == -1) {
880 data->searchx = data->cx;
881 data->searchy = data->cy;
882 data->searcho = data->oy;
883 } else if (data->searchstr != NULL &&
884 strcmp(argument, data->searchstr) != 0) {
885 data->cx = data->searchx;
886 data->cy = data->searchy;
887 data->oy = data->searcho;
888 redraw = 1;
889 }
890 if (*argument == '\0') {
891 window_copy_clear_marks(wp);
892 redraw = 1;
893 } else if (prefix == '=' || prefix == '-') {
894 data->searchtype = WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHUP;
895 free(data->searchstr);
896 data->searchstr = xstrdup(argument);
897 if (!window_copy_search_up(wp)) {
898 window_copy_clear_marks(wp);
899 redraw = 1;
900 }
901 } else if (prefix == '+') {
902 data->searchtype = WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHDOWN;
903 free(data->searchstr);
904 data->searchstr = xstrdup(argument);
905 if (!window_copy_search_down(wp)) {
906 window_copy_clear_marks(wp);
907 redraw = 1;
908 }
909 }
910 }
911 if (strcmp(command, "search-forward-incremental") == 0) {
912 prefix = *argument++;
913 if (data->searchx == -1 || data->searchy == -1) {
914 data->searchx = data->cx;
915 data->searchy = data->cy;
916 data->searcho = data->oy;
917 } else if (data->searchstr != NULL &&
918 strcmp(argument, data->searchstr) != 0) {
919 data->cx = data->searchx;
920 data->cy = data->searchy;
921 data->oy = data->searcho;
922 redraw = 1;
923 }
924 if (*argument == '\0') {
925 window_copy_clear_marks(wp);
926 redraw = 1;
927 } else if (prefix == '=' || prefix == '+') {
928 data->searchtype = WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHDOWN;
929 free(data->searchstr);
930 data->searchstr = xstrdup(argument);
931 if (!window_copy_search_down(wp)) {
932 window_copy_clear_marks(wp);
933 redraw = 1;
934 }
935 } else if (prefix == '-') {
936 data->searchtype = WINDOW_COPY_SEARCHUP;
937 free(data->searchstr);
938 data->searchstr = xstrdup(argument);
939 if (!window_copy_search_up(wp)) {
940 window_copy_clear_marks(wp);
941 redraw = 1;
942 }
943 }
944 }
945 }
946
947 if (strncmp(command, "search-", 7) != 0 && data->searchmark != NULL) {
948 window_copy_clear_marks(wp);
949 redraw = 1;
950 data->searchx = data->searchy = -1;
951 }
952
953 if (cancel)
954 window_pane_reset_mode(wp);
955 else if (redraw)
956 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
957 wp->modeprefix = 1;
958}
959
960static void
961window_copy_scroll_to(struct window_pane *wp, u_int px, u_int py)
962{
963 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
964 struct grid *gd = data->backing->grid;
965 u_int offset, gap;
966
967 data->cx = px;
968
969 if (py >= gd->hsize - data->oy && py < gd->hsize - data->oy + gd->sy)
970 data->cy = py - (gd->hsize - data->oy);
971 else {
972 gap = gd->sy / 4;
973 if (py < gd->sy) {
974 offset = 0;
975 data->cy = py;
976 } else if (py > gd->hsize + gd->sy - gap) {
977 offset = gd->hsize;
978 data->cy = py - gd->hsize;
979 } else {
980 offset = py + gap - gd->sy;
981 data->cy = py - offset;
982 }
983 data->oy = gd->hsize - offset;
984 }
985
986 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
987 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
988}
989
990static int
991window_copy_search_compare(struct grid *gd, u_int px, u_int py,
992 struct grid *sgd, u_int spx, int cis)
993{
994 struct grid_cell gc, sgc;
995 const struct utf8_data *ud, *sud;
996
997 grid_get_cell(gd, px, py, &gc);
998 ud = &gc.data;
999 grid_get_cell(sgd, spx, 0, &sgc);
1000 sud = &sgc.data;
1001
1002 if (ud->size != sud->size || ud->width != sud->width)
1003 return (0);
1004
1005 if (cis && ud->size == 1)
1006 return (tolower(ud->data[0]) == sud->data[0]);
1007
1008 return (memcmp(ud->data, sud->data, ud->size) == 0);
1009}
1010
1011static int
1012window_copy_search_lr(struct grid *gd,
1013 struct grid *sgd, u_int *ppx, u_int py, u_int first, u_int last, int cis)
1014{
1015 u_int ax, bx, px;
1016 int matched;
1017
1018 for (ax = first; ax < last; ax++) {
1019 if (ax + sgd->sx > gd->sx)
1020 break;
1021 for (bx = 0; bx < sgd->sx; bx++) {
1022 px = ax + bx;
1023 matched = window_copy_search_compare(gd, px, py, sgd,
1024 bx, cis);
1025 if (!matched)
1026 break;
1027 }
1028 if (bx == sgd->sx) {
1029 *ppx = ax;
1030 return (1);
1031 }
1032 }
1033 return (0);
1034}
1035
1036static int
1037window_copy_search_rl(struct grid *gd,
1038 struct grid *sgd, u_int *ppx, u_int py, u_int first, u_int last, int cis)
1039{
1040 u_int ax, bx, px;
1041 int matched;
1042
1043 for (ax = last + 1; ax > first; ax--) {
1044 if (gd->sx - (ax - 1) < sgd->sx)
1045 continue;
1046 for (bx = 0; bx < sgd->sx; bx++) {
1047 px = ax - 1 + bx;
1048 matched = window_copy_search_compare(gd, px, py, sgd,
1049 bx, cis);
1050 if (!matched)
1051 break;
1052 }
1053 if (bx == sgd->sx) {
1054 *ppx = ax - 1;
1055 return (1);
1056 }
1057 }
1058 return (0);
1059}
1060
1061static void
1062window_copy_move_left(struct screen *s, u_int *fx, u_int *fy)
1063{
1064 if (*fx == 0) { /* left */
1065 if (*fy == 0) /* top */
1066 return;
1067 *fx = screen_size_x(s) - 1;
1068 *fy = *fy - 1;
1069 } else
1070 *fx = *fx - 1;
1071}
1072
1073static void
1074window_copy_move_right(struct screen *s, u_int *fx, u_int *fy)
1075{
1076 if (*fx == screen_size_x(s) - 1) { /* right */
1077 if (*fy == screen_hsize(s) + screen_size_y(s)) /* bottom */
1078 return;
1079 *fx = 0;
1080 *fy = *fy + 1;
1081 } else
1082 *fx = *fx + 1;
1083}
1084
1085static int
1086window_copy_is_lowercase(const char *ptr)
1087{
1088 while (*ptr != '\0') {
1089 if (*ptr != tolower((u_char)*ptr))
1090 return (0);
1091 ++ptr;
1092 }
1093 return (1);
1094}
1095
1096/*
1097 * Search for text stored in sgd starting from position fx,fy up to endline. If
1098 * found, jump to it. If cis then ignore case. The direction is 0 for searching
1099 * up, down otherwise. If wrap then go to begin/end of grid and try again if
1100 * not found.
1101 */
1102static int
1103window_copy_search_jump(struct window_pane *wp, struct grid *gd,
1104 struct grid *sgd, u_int fx, u_int fy, u_int endline, int cis, int wrap,
1105 int direction)
1106{
1107 u_int i, px;
1108 int found;
1109
1110 found = 0;
1111 if (direction) {
1112 for (i = fy; i <= endline; i++) {
1113 found = window_copy_search_lr(gd, sgd, &px, i, fx,
1114 gd->sx, cis);
1115 if (found)
1116 break;
1117 fx = 0;
1118 }
1119 } else {
1120 for (i = fy + 1; endline < i; i--) {
1121 found = window_copy_search_rl(gd, sgd, &px, i - 1, 0,
1122 fx, cis);
1123 if (found) {
1124 i--;
1125 break;
1126 }
1127 fx = gd->sx;
1128 }
1129 }
1130
1131 if (found) {
1132 window_copy_scroll_to(wp, px, i);
1133 return (1);
1134 }
1135 if (wrap) {
1136 return (window_copy_search_jump(wp, gd, sgd,
1137 direction ? 0 : gd->sx - 1,
1138 direction ? 0 : gd->hsize + gd->sy - 1, fy, cis, 0,
1139 direction));
1140 }
1141 return (0);
1142}
1143
1144/*
1145 * Search in for text searchstr. If direction is 0 then search up, otherwise
1146 * down.
1147 */
1148static int
1149window_copy_search(struct window_pane *wp, int direction)
1150{
1151 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1152 struct screen *s = data->backing, ss;
1153 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
1154 struct grid *gd = s->grid;
1155 u_int fx, fy, endline;
1156 int wrapflag, cis, found;
1157
1158 free(wp->searchstr);
1159 wp->searchstr = xstrdup(data->searchstr);
1160
1161 fx = data->cx;
1162 fy = screen_hsize(data->backing) - data->oy + data->cy;
1163
1164 screen_init(&ss, screen_write_strlen("%s", data->searchstr), 1, 0);
1165 screen_write_start(&ctx, NULL, &ss);
1166 screen_write_nputs(&ctx, -1, &grid_default_cell, "%s", data->searchstr);
1167 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
1168
1169 if (direction)
1170 window_copy_move_right(s, &fx, &fy);
1171 else
1172 window_copy_move_left(s, &fx, &fy);
1173 window_copy_clear_selection(wp);
1174
1175 wrapflag = options_get_number(wp->window->options, "wrap-search");
1176 cis = window_copy_is_lowercase(data->searchstr);
1177
1178 if (direction)
1179 endline = gd->hsize + gd->sy - 1;
1180 else
1181 endline = 0;
1182 found = window_copy_search_jump(wp, gd, ss.grid, fx, fy, endline, cis,
1183 wrapflag, direction);
1184
1185 if (window_copy_search_marks(wp, &ss))
1186 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
1187
1188 screen_free(&ss);
1189 return (found);
1190}
1191
1192static int
1193window_copy_search_marks(struct window_pane *wp, struct screen *ssp)
1194{
1195 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1196 struct screen *s = data->backing, ss;
1197 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
1198 struct grid *gd = s->grid;
1199 int found, cis, which = -1;
1200 u_int px, py, b, nfound = 0, width;
1201
1202 if (ssp == NULL) {
1203 width = screen_write_strlen("%s", data->searchstr);
1204 screen_init(&ss, width, 1, 0);
1205 screen_write_start(&ctx, NULL, &ss);
1206 screen_write_nputs(&ctx, -1, &grid_default_cell, "%s",
1207 data->searchstr);
1208 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
1209 ssp = &ss;
1210 } else
1211 width = screen_size_x(ssp);
1212
1213 cis = window_copy_is_lowercase(data->searchstr);
1214
1215 free(data->searchmark);
1216 data->searchmark = bit_alloc((gd->hsize + gd->sy) * gd->sx);
1217
1218 for (py = 0; py < gd->hsize + gd->sy; py++) {
1219 px = 0;
1220 for (;;) {
1221 found = window_copy_search_lr(gd, ssp->grid, &px, py,
1222 px, gd->sx, cis);
1223 if (!found)
1224 break;
1225
1226 nfound++;
1227 if (px == data->cx && py == gd->hsize + data->cy - data->oy)
1228 which = nfound;
1229
1230 b = (py * gd->sx) + px;
1231 bit_nset(data->searchmark, b, b + width - 1);
1232
1233 px++;
1234 }
1235 }
1236
1237 if (which != -1)
1238 data->searchthis = 1 + nfound - which;
1239 else
1240 data->searchthis = -1;
1241 data->searchcount = nfound;
1242
1243 if (ssp == &ss)
1244 screen_free(&ss);
1245 return (nfound);
1246}
1247
1248static void
1249window_copy_clear_marks(struct window_pane *wp)
1250{
1251 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1252
1253 free(data->searchmark);
1254 data->searchmark = NULL;
1255}
1256
1257static int
1258window_copy_search_up(struct window_pane *wp)
1259{
1260 return (window_copy_search(wp, 0));
1261}
1262
1263static int
1264window_copy_search_down(struct window_pane *wp)
1265{
1266 return (window_copy_search(wp, 1));
1267}
1268
1269static void
1270window_copy_goto_line(struct window_pane *wp, const char *linestr)
1271{
1272 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1273 const char *errstr;
1274 u_int lineno;
1275
1276 lineno = strtonum(linestr, 0, screen_hsize(data->backing), &errstr);
1277 if (errstr != NULL)
1278 return;
1279
1280 data->oy = lineno;
1281 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
1282 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
1283}
1284
1285static void
1286window_copy_write_line(struct window_pane *wp, struct screen_write_ctx *ctx,
1287 u_int py)
1288{
1289 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1290 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
1291 struct options *oo = wp->window->options;
1292 struct grid_cell gc;
1293 char hdr[512];
1294 size_t size = 0;
1295
1296 style_apply(&gc, oo, "mode-style");
1297 gc.flags |= GRID_FLAG_NOPALETTE;
1298
1299 if (py == 0) {
1300 if (data->searchmark == NULL) {
1301 size = xsnprintf(hdr, sizeof hdr,
1302 "[%u/%u]", data->oy, screen_hsize(data->backing));
1303 } else {
1304 if (data->searchthis == -1) {
1305 size = xsnprintf(hdr, sizeof hdr,
1306 "(%u results) [%d/%u]", data->searchcount,
1307 data->oy, screen_hsize(data->backing));
1308 } else {
1309 size = xsnprintf(hdr, sizeof hdr,
1310 "(%u/%u results) [%d/%u]", data->searchthis,
1311 data->searchcount, data->oy,
1312 screen_hsize(data->backing));
1313 }
1314 }
1315 if (size > screen_size_x(s))
1316 size = screen_size_x(s);
1317 screen_write_cursormove(ctx, screen_size_x(s) - size, 0);
1318 screen_write_puts(ctx, &gc, "%s", hdr);
1319 } else
1320 size = 0;
1321
1322 if (size < screen_size_x(s)) {
1323 screen_write_cursormove(ctx, 0, py);
1324 screen_write_copy(ctx, data->backing, 0,
1325 (screen_hsize(data->backing) - data->oy) + py,
1326 screen_size_x(s) - size, 1, data->searchmark, &gc);
1327 }
1328
1329 if (py == data->cy && data->cx == screen_size_x(s)) {
1330 memcpy(&gc, &grid_default_cell, sizeof gc);
1331 screen_write_cursormove(ctx, screen_size_x(s) - 1, py);
1332 screen_write_putc(ctx, &gc, '$');
1333 }
1334}
1335
1336static void
1337window_copy_write_lines(struct window_pane *wp, struct screen_write_ctx *ctx,
1338 u_int py, u_int ny)
1339{
1340 u_int yy;
1341
1342 for (yy = py; yy < py + ny; yy++)
1343 window_copy_write_line(wp, ctx, py);
1344}
1345
1346static void
1347window_copy_redraw_selection(struct window_pane *wp, u_int old_y)
1348{
1349 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1350 u_int new_y, start, end;
1351
1352 new_y = data->cy;
1353 if (old_y <= new_y) {
1354 start = old_y;
1355 end = new_y;
1356 } else {
1357 start = new_y;
1358 end = old_y;
1359 }
1360 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, start, end - start + 1);
1361}
1362
1363static void
1364window_copy_redraw_lines(struct window_pane *wp, u_int py, u_int ny)
1365{
1366 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1367 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
1368 u_int i;
1369
1370 screen_write_start(&ctx, wp, NULL);
1371 for (i = py; i < py + ny; i++)
1372 window_copy_write_line(wp, &ctx, i);
1373 screen_write_cursormove(&ctx, data->cx, data->cy);
1374 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
1375}
1376
1377static void
1378window_copy_redraw_screen(struct window_pane *wp)
1379{
1380 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1381
1382 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, 0, screen_size_y(&data->screen));
1383}
1384
1385static void
1386window_copy_synchronize_cursor(struct window_pane *wp)
1387{
1388 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1389 u_int xx, yy;
1390
1391 xx = data->cx;
1392 yy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
1393
1394 switch (data->cursordrag) {
1395 case CURSORDRAG_ENDSEL:
1396 data->endselx = xx;
1397 data->endsely = yy;
1398 break;
1399 case CURSORDRAG_SEL:
1400 data->selx = xx;
1401 data->sely = yy;
1402 break;
1403 case CURSORDRAG_NONE:
1404 break;
1405 }
1406}
1407
1408static void
1409window_copy_update_cursor(struct window_pane *wp, u_int cx, u_int cy)
1410{
1411 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1412 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
1413 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
1414 u_int old_cx, old_cy;
1415
1416 old_cx = data->cx; old_cy = data->cy;
1417 data->cx = cx; data->cy = cy;
1418 if (old_cx == screen_size_x(s))
1419 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, old_cy, 1);
1420 if (data->cx == screen_size_x(s))
1421 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
1422 else {
1423 screen_write_start(&ctx, wp, NULL);
1424 screen_write_cursormove(&ctx, data->cx, data->cy);
1425 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
1426 }
1427}
1428
1429static void
1430window_copy_start_selection(struct window_pane *wp)
1431{
1432 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1433
1434 data->selx = data->cx;
1435 data->sely = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
1436
1437 data->endselx = data->selx;
1438 data->endsely = data->sely;
1439
1440 data->cursordrag = CURSORDRAG_ENDSEL;
1441
1442 window_copy_set_selection(wp, 1);
1443}
1444
1445static int
1446window_copy_adjust_selection(struct window_pane *wp, u_int *selx, u_int *sely)
1447{
1448 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1449 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
1450 u_int sx, sy, ty;
1451 int relpos;
1452
1453 sx = *selx;
1454 sy = *sely;
1455
1456 ty = screen_hsize(data->backing) - data->oy;
1457 if (sy < ty) {
1458 relpos = WINDOW_COPY_REL_POS_ABOVE;
1459 if (!data->rectflag)
1460 sx = 0;
1461 sy = 0;
1462 } else if (sy > ty + screen_size_y(s) - 1) {
1463 relpos = WINDOW_COPY_REL_POS_BELOW;
1464 if (!data->rectflag)
1465 sx = screen_size_x(s) - 1;
1466 sy = screen_size_y(s) - 1;
1467 } else {
1468 relpos = WINDOW_COPY_REL_POS_ON_SCREEN;
1469 sy -= ty;
1470 }
1471
1472 *selx = sx;
1473 *sely = sy;
1474 return (relpos);
1475}
1476
1477static int
1478window_copy_update_selection(struct window_pane *wp, int may_redraw)
1479{
1480 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1481 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
1482
1483 if (s->sel == NULL && data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_NONE)
1484 return (0);
1485 return (window_copy_set_selection(wp, may_redraw));
1486}
1487
1488static int
1489window_copy_set_selection(struct window_pane *wp, int may_redraw)
1490{
1491 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1492 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
1493 struct options *oo = wp->window->options;
1494 struct grid_cell gc;
1495 u_int sx, sy, cy, endsx, endsy;
1496 int startrelpos, endrelpos;
1497
1498 window_copy_synchronize_cursor(wp);
1499
1500 /* Adjust the selection. */
1501 sx = data->selx;
1502 sy = data->sely;
1503 startrelpos = window_copy_adjust_selection(wp, &sx, &sy);
1504
1505 /* Adjust the end of selection. */
1506 endsx = data->endselx;
1507 endsy = data->endsely;
1508 endrelpos = window_copy_adjust_selection(wp, &endsx, &endsy);
1509
1510 /* Selection is outside of the current screen */
1511 if (startrelpos == endrelpos &&
1512 startrelpos != WINDOW_COPY_REL_POS_ON_SCREEN) {
1513 screen_hide_selection(s);
1514 return (0);
1515 }
1516
1517 /* Set colours and selection. */
1518 style_apply(&gc, oo, "mode-style");
1519 gc.flags |= GRID_FLAG_NOPALETTE;
1520 screen_set_selection(s, sx, sy, endsx, endsy, data->rectflag,
1521 data->modekeys, &gc);
1522
1523 if (data->rectflag && may_redraw) {
1524 /*
1525 * Can't rely on the caller to redraw the right lines for
1526 * rectangle selection - find the highest line and the number
1527 * of lines, and redraw just past that in both directions
1528 */
1529 cy = data->cy;
1530 if (data->cursordrag == CURSORDRAG_ENDSEL) {
1531 if (sy < cy)
1532 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, sy, cy - sy + 1);
1533 else
1534 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, cy, sy - cy + 1);
1535 } else {
1536 if (endsy < cy)
1537 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, endsy, cy - endsy + 1);
1538 else
1539 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, cy, endsy - cy + 1);
1540 }
1541 }
1542
1543 return (1);
1544}
1545
1546static void *
1547window_copy_get_selection(struct window_pane *wp, size_t *len)
1548{
1549 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1550 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
1551 char *buf;
1552 size_t off;
1553 u_int i, xx, yy, sx, sy, ex, ey, ey_last;
1554 u_int firstsx, lastex, restex, restsx, selx;
1555 int keys;
1556
1557 if (data->screen.sel == NULL && data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_NONE)
1558 return (NULL);
1559
1560 buf = xmalloc(1);
1561 off = 0;
1562
1563 *buf = '\0';
1564
1565 /*
1566 * The selection extends from selx,sely to (adjusted) cx,cy on
1567 * the base screen.
1568 */
1569
1570 /* Find start and end. */
1571 xx = data->endselx;
1572 yy = data->endsely;
1573 if (yy < data->sely || (yy == data->sely && xx < data->selx)) {
1574 sx = xx; sy = yy;
1575 ex = data->selx; ey = data->sely;
1576 } else {
1577 sx = data->selx; sy = data->sely;
1578 ex = xx; ey = yy;
1579 }
1580
1581 /* Trim ex to end of line. */
1582 ey_last = window_copy_find_length(wp, ey);
1583 if (ex > ey_last)
1584 ex = ey_last;
1585
1586 /*
1587 * Deal with rectangle-copy if necessary; four situations: start of
1588 * first line (firstsx), end of last line (lastex), start (restsx) and
1589 * end (restex) of all other lines.
1590 */
1591 xx = screen_size_x(s);
1592
1593 /*
1594 * Behave according to mode-keys. If it is emacs, copy like emacs,
1595 * keeping the top-left-most character, and dropping the
1596 * bottom-right-most, regardless of copy direction. If it is vi, also
1597 * keep bottom-right-most character.
1598 */
1599 keys = options_get_number(wp->window->options, "mode-keys");
1600 if (data->rectflag) {
1601 /*
1602 * Need to ignore the column with the cursor in it, which for
1603 * rectangular copy means knowing which side the cursor is on.
1604 */
1605 if (data->cursordrag == CURSORDRAG_ENDSEL)
1606 selx = data->selx;
1607 else
1608 selx = data->endselx;
1609 if (selx < data->cx) {
1610 /* Selection start is on the left. */
1611 if (keys == MODEKEY_EMACS) {
1612 lastex = data->cx;
1613 restex = data->cx;
1614 }
1615 else {
1616 lastex = data->cx + 1;
1617 restex = data->cx + 1;
1618 }
1619 firstsx = selx;
1620 restsx = selx;
1621 } else {
1622 /* Cursor is on the left. */
1623 lastex = selx + 1;
1624 restex = selx + 1;
1625 firstsx = data->cx;
1626 restsx = data->cx;
1627 }
1628 } else {
1629 if (keys == MODEKEY_EMACS)
1630 lastex = ex;
1631 else
1632 lastex = ex + 1;
1633 restex = xx;
1634 firstsx = sx;
1635 restsx = 0;
1636 }
1637
1638 /* Copy the lines. */
1639 for (i = sy; i <= ey; i++) {
1640 window_copy_copy_line(wp, &buf, &off, i,
1641 (i == sy ? firstsx : restsx),
1642 (i == ey ? lastex : restex));
1643 }
1644
1645 /* Don't bother if no data. */
1646 if (off == 0) {
1647 free(buf);
1648 return (NULL);
1649 }
1650 if (keys == MODEKEY_EMACS || lastex <= ey_last)
1651 off -= 1; /* remove final \n (unless at end in vi mode) */
1652 *len = off;
1653 return (buf);
1654}
1655
1656static void
1657window_copy_copy_buffer(struct window_pane *wp, const char *bufname, void *buf,
1658 size_t len)
1659{
1660 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
1661
1662 if (options_get_number(global_options, "set-clipboard") != 0) {
1663 screen_write_start(&ctx, wp, NULL);
1664 screen_write_setselection(&ctx, buf, len);
1665 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
1666 notify_pane("pane-set-clipboard", wp);
1667 }
1668
1669 if (paste_set(buf, len, bufname, NULL) != 0)
1670 free(buf);
1671}
1672
1673static void
1674window_copy_copy_pipe(struct window_pane *wp, struct session *s,
1675 const char *bufname, const char *arg)
1676{
1677 void *buf;
1678 size_t len;
1679 struct job *job;
1680 char *expanded;
1681
1682 buf = window_copy_get_selection(wp, &len);
1683 if (buf == NULL)
1684 return;
1685 expanded = format_single(NULL, arg, NULL, s, NULL, wp);
1686
1687 job = job_run(expanded, s, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, JOB_NOWAIT);
1688 bufferevent_write(job->event, buf, len);
1689
1690 free(expanded);
1691 window_copy_copy_buffer(wp, bufname, buf, len);
1692}
1693
1694static void
1695window_copy_copy_selection(struct window_pane *wp, const char *bufname)
1696{
1697 void *buf;
1698 size_t len;
1699
1700 buf = window_copy_get_selection(wp, &len);
1701 if (buf == NULL)
1702 return;
1703
1704 window_copy_copy_buffer(wp, bufname, buf, len);
1705}
1706
1707static void
1708window_copy_append_selection(struct window_pane *wp, const char *bufname)
1709{
1710 char *buf;
1711 struct paste_buffer *pb;
1712 const char *bufdata;
1713 size_t len, bufsize;
1714 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
1715
1716 buf = window_copy_get_selection(wp, &len);
1717 if (buf == NULL)
1718 return;
1719
1720 if (options_get_number(global_options, "set-clipboard") != 0) {
1721 screen_write_start(&ctx, wp, NULL);
1722 screen_write_setselection(&ctx, (u_char *)buf, len);
1723 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
1724 notify_pane("pane-set-clipboard", wp);
1725 }
1726
1727 if (bufname == NULL || *bufname == '\0')
1728 pb = paste_get_top(&bufname);
1729 else
1730 pb = paste_get_name(bufname);
1731 if (pb != NULL) {
1732 bufdata = paste_buffer_data(pb, &bufsize);
1733 buf = xrealloc(buf, len + bufsize);
1734 memmove(buf + bufsize, buf, len);
1735 memcpy(buf, bufdata, bufsize);
1736 len += bufsize;
1737 }
1738 if (paste_set(buf, len, bufname, NULL) != 0)
1739 free(buf);
1740}
1741
1742static void
1743window_copy_copy_line(struct window_pane *wp, char **buf, size_t *off, u_int sy,
1744 u_int sx, u_int ex)
1745{
1746 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1747 struct grid *gd = data->backing->grid;
1748 struct grid_cell gc;
1749 struct grid_line *gl;
1750 struct utf8_data ud;
1751 u_int i, xx, wrapped = 0;
1752 const char *s;
1753
1754 if (sx > ex)
1755 return;
1756
1757 /*
1758 * Work out if the line was wrapped at the screen edge and all of it is
1759 * on screen.
1760 */
1761 gl = grid_get_line(gd, sy);
1762 if (gl->flags & GRID_LINE_WRAPPED && gl->cellsize <= gd->sx)
1763 wrapped = 1;
1764
1765 /* If the line was wrapped, don't strip spaces (use the full length). */
1766 if (wrapped)
1767 xx = gl->cellsize;
1768 else
1769 xx = window_copy_find_length(wp, sy);
1770 if (ex > xx)
1771 ex = xx;
1772 if (sx > xx)
1773 sx = xx;
1774
1775 if (sx < ex) {
1776 for (i = sx; i < ex; i++) {
1777 grid_get_cell(gd, i, sy, &gc);
1778 if (gc.flags & GRID_FLAG_PADDING)
1779 continue;
1780 utf8_copy(&ud, &gc.data);
1781 if (ud.size == 1 && (gc.attr & GRID_ATTR_CHARSET)) {
1782 s = tty_acs_get(NULL, ud.data[0]);
1783 if (s != NULL && strlen(s) <= sizeof ud.data) {
1784 ud.size = strlen(s);
1785 memcpy(ud.data, s, ud.size);
1786 }
1787 }
1788
1789 *buf = xrealloc(*buf, (*off) + ud.size);
1790 memcpy(*buf + *off, ud.data, ud.size);
1791 *off += ud.size;
1792 }
1793 }
1794
1795 /* Only add a newline if the line wasn't wrapped. */
1796 if (!wrapped || ex != xx) {
1797 *buf = xrealloc(*buf, (*off) + 1);
1798 (*buf)[(*off)++] = '\n';
1799 }
1800}
1801
1802static void
1803window_copy_clear_selection(struct window_pane *wp)
1804{
1805 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1806 u_int px, py;
1807
1808 screen_clear_selection(&data->screen);
1809
1810 data->cursordrag = CURSORDRAG_NONE;
1811
1812 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
1813 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
1814 if (data->cx > px)
1815 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px, data->cy);
1816}
1817
1818static int
1819window_copy_in_set(struct window_pane *wp, u_int px, u_int py, const char *set)
1820{
1821 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1822 struct grid_cell gc;
1823 const struct utf8_data *ud;
1824
1825 grid_get_cell(data->backing->grid, px, py, &gc);
1826
1827 ud = &gc.data;
1828 if (ud->size != 1 || (gc.flags & GRID_FLAG_PADDING))
1829 return (0);
1830 if (*ud->data == 0x00 || *ud->data == 0x7f)
1831 return (0);
1832 return (strchr(set, *ud->data) != NULL);
1833}
1834
1835static u_int
1836window_copy_find_length(struct window_pane *wp, u_int py)
1837{
1838 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1839 struct screen *s = data->backing;
1840 struct grid_cell gc;
1841 u_int px;
1842
1843 /*
1844 * If the pane has been resized, its grid can contain old overlong
1845 * lines. grid_peek_cell does not allow accessing cells beyond the
1846 * width of the grid, and screen_write_copy treats them as spaces, so
1847 * ignore them here too.
1848 */
1849 px = grid_get_line(s->grid, py)->cellsize;
1850 if (px > screen_size_x(s))
1851 px = screen_size_x(s);
1852 while (px > 0) {
1853 grid_get_cell(s->grid, px - 1, py, &gc);
1854 if (gc.data.size != 1 || *gc.data.data != ' ')
1855 break;
1856 px--;
1857 }
1858 return (px);
1859}
1860
1861static void
1862window_copy_cursor_start_of_line(struct window_pane *wp)
1863{
1864 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1865 struct screen *back_s = data->backing;
1866 struct grid *gd = back_s->grid;
1867 u_int py;
1868
1869 if (data->cx == 0 && data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_NONE) {
1870 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
1871 while (py > 0 &&
1872 grid_get_line(gd, py - 1)->flags & GRID_LINE_WRAPPED) {
1873 window_copy_cursor_up(wp, 0);
1874 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
1875 }
1876 }
1877 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, 0, data->cy);
1878 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
1879 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
1880}
1881
1882static void
1883window_copy_cursor_back_to_indentation(struct window_pane *wp)
1884{
1885 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1886 u_int px, py, xx;
1887 struct grid_cell gc;
1888
1889 px = 0;
1890 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
1891 xx = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
1892
1893 while (px < xx) {
1894 grid_get_cell(data->backing->grid, px, py, &gc);
1895 if (gc.data.size != 1 || *gc.data.data != ' ')
1896 break;
1897 px++;
1898 }
1899
1900 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px, data->cy);
1901 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
1902 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
1903}
1904
1905static void
1906window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(struct window_pane *wp)
1907{
1908 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1909 struct screen *back_s = data->backing;
1910 struct grid *gd = back_s->grid;
1911 struct grid_line *gl;
1912 u_int px, py;
1913
1914 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
1915 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
1916
1917 if (data->cx == px && data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_NONE) {
1918 if (data->screen.sel != NULL && data->rectflag)
1919 px = screen_size_x(back_s);
1920 gl = grid_get_line(gd, py);
1921 if (gl->flags & GRID_LINE_WRAPPED) {
1922 while (py < gd->sy + gd->hsize) {
1923 gl = grid_get_line(gd, py);
1924 if (~gl->flags & GRID_LINE_WRAPPED)
1925 break;
1926 window_copy_cursor_down(wp, 0);
1927 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
1928 }
1929 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
1930 }
1931 }
1932 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px, data->cy);
1933
1934 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
1935 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
1936}
1937
1938static void
1939window_copy_other_end(struct window_pane *wp)
1940{
1941 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1942 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
1943 u_int selx, sely, cy, yy, hsize;
1944
1945 if (s->sel == NULL && data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_NONE)
1946 return;
1947
1948 if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_LEFT_RIGHT)
1949 data->lineflag = LINE_SEL_RIGHT_LEFT;
1950 else if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_RIGHT_LEFT)
1951 data->lineflag = LINE_SEL_LEFT_RIGHT;
1952
1953 switch (data->cursordrag) {
1954 case CURSORDRAG_NONE:
1955 case CURSORDRAG_SEL:
1956 data->cursordrag = CURSORDRAG_ENDSEL;
1957 break;
1958 case CURSORDRAG_ENDSEL:
1959 data->cursordrag = CURSORDRAG_SEL;
1960 break;
1961 }
1962
1963 selx = data->endselx;
1964 sely = data->endsely;
1965 if (data->cursordrag == CURSORDRAG_SEL) {
1966 selx = data->selx;
1967 sely = data->sely;
1968 }
1969
1970 cy = data->cy;
1971 yy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
1972
1973 data->cx = selx;
1974
1975 hsize = screen_hsize(data->backing);
1976 if (sely < hsize - data->oy) { /* above */
1977 data->oy = hsize - sely;
1978 data->cy = 0;
1979 } else if (sely > hsize - data->oy + screen_size_y(s)) { /* below */
1980 data->oy = hsize - sely + screen_size_y(s) - 1;
1981 data->cy = screen_size_y(s) - 1;
1982 } else
1983 data->cy = cy + sely - yy;
1984
1985 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
1986 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
1987}
1988
1989static void
1990window_copy_cursor_left(struct window_pane *wp)
1991{
1992 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
1993 u_int py, cx;
1994 struct grid_cell gc;
1995
1996 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
1997 cx = data->cx;
1998 while (cx > 0) {
1999 grid_get_cell(data->backing->grid, cx, py, &gc);
2000 if (~gc.flags & GRID_FLAG_PADDING)
2001 break;
2002 cx--;
2003 }
2004 if (cx == 0 && py > 0) {
2005 window_copy_cursor_up(wp, 0);
2006 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
2007 } else if (cx > 0) {
2008 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, cx - 1, data->cy);
2009 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2010 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2011 }
2012}
2013
2014static void
2015window_copy_cursor_right(struct window_pane *wp)
2016{
2017 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2018 u_int px, py, yy, cx, cy;
2019 struct grid_cell gc;
2020
2021 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
2022 yy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + screen_size_y(data->backing) - 1;
2023 if (data->screen.sel != NULL && data->rectflag)
2024 px = screen_size_x(&data->screen);
2025 else
2026 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2027
2028 if (data->cx >= px && py < yy) {
2029 window_copy_cursor_start_of_line(wp);
2030 window_copy_cursor_down(wp, 0);
2031 } else if (data->cx < px) {
2032 cx = data->cx + 1;
2033 cy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
2034 while (cx < px) {
2035 grid_get_cell(data->backing->grid, cx, cy, &gc);
2036 if (~gc.flags & GRID_FLAG_PADDING)
2037 break;
2038 cx++;
2039 }
2040 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, cx, data->cy);
2041 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2042 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2043 }
2044}
2045
2046static void
2047window_copy_cursor_up(struct window_pane *wp, int scroll_only)
2048{
2049 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2050 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
2051 u_int ox, oy, px, py;
2052
2053 oy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
2054 ox = window_copy_find_length(wp, oy);
2055 if (data->cx != ox) {
2056 data->lastcx = data->cx;
2057 data->lastsx = ox;
2058 }
2059
2060 if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_LEFT_RIGHT && oy == data->sely)
2061 window_copy_other_end(wp);
2062
2063 data->cx = data->lastcx;
2064 if (scroll_only || data->cy == 0) {
2065 window_copy_scroll_down(wp, 1);
2066 if (scroll_only) {
2067 if (data->cy == screen_size_y(s) - 1)
2068 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2069 else
2070 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 2);
2071 }
2072 } else {
2073 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, data->cx, data->cy - 1);
2074 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1)) {
2075 if (data->cy == screen_size_y(s) - 1)
2076 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2077 else
2078 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 2);
2079 }
2080 }
2081
2082 if (data->screen.sel != NULL || !data->rectflag) {
2083 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
2084 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2085 if ((data->cx >= data->lastsx && data->cx != px) ||
2086 data->cx > px)
2087 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
2088 }
2089
2090 if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_LEFT_RIGHT)
2091 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
2092 else if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_RIGHT_LEFT)
2093 window_copy_cursor_start_of_line(wp);
2094}
2095
2096static void
2097window_copy_cursor_down(struct window_pane *wp, int scroll_only)
2098{
2099 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2100 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
2101 u_int ox, oy, px, py;
2102
2103 oy = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
2104 ox = window_copy_find_length(wp, oy);
2105 if (data->cx != ox) {
2106 data->lastcx = data->cx;
2107 data->lastsx = ox;
2108 }
2109
2110 if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_RIGHT_LEFT && oy == data->endsely)
2111 window_copy_other_end(wp);
2112
2113 data->cx = data->lastcx;
2114 if (scroll_only || data->cy == screen_size_y(s) - 1) {
2115 window_copy_scroll_up(wp, 1);
2116 if (scroll_only && data->cy > 0)
2117 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy - 1, 2);
2118 } else {
2119 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, data->cx, data->cy + 1);
2120 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2121 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy - 1, 2);
2122 }
2123
2124 if (data->screen.sel == NULL || !data->rectflag) {
2125 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
2126 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2127 if ((data->cx >= data->lastsx && data->cx != px) ||
2128 data->cx > px)
2129 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
2130 }
2131
2132 if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_LEFT_RIGHT)
2133 window_copy_cursor_end_of_line(wp);
2134 else if (data->lineflag == LINE_SEL_RIGHT_LEFT)
2135 window_copy_cursor_start_of_line(wp);
2136}
2137
2138static void
2139window_copy_cursor_jump(struct window_pane *wp)
2140{
2141 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2142 struct screen *back_s = data->backing;
2143 struct grid_cell gc;
2144 u_int px, py, xx;
2145
2146 px = data->cx + 1;
2147 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
2148 xx = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2149
2150 while (px < xx) {
2151 grid_get_cell(back_s->grid, px, py, &gc);
2152 if (!(gc.flags & GRID_FLAG_PADDING) &&
2153 gc.data.size == 1 && *gc.data.data == data->jumpchar) {
2154 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px, data->cy);
2155 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2156 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2157 return;
2158 }
2159 px++;
2160 }
2161}
2162
2163static void
2164window_copy_cursor_jump_back(struct window_pane *wp)
2165{
2166 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2167 struct screen *back_s = data->backing;
2168 struct grid_cell gc;
2169 u_int px, py;
2170
2171 px = data->cx;
2172 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
2173
2174 if (px > 0)
2175 px--;
2176
2177 for (;;) {
2178 grid_get_cell(back_s->grid, px, py, &gc);
2179 if (!(gc.flags & GRID_FLAG_PADDING) &&
2180 gc.data.size == 1 && *gc.data.data == data->jumpchar) {
2181 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px, data->cy);
2182 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2183 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2184 return;
2185 }
2186 if (px == 0)
2187 break;
2188 px--;
2189 }
2190}
2191
2192static void
2193window_copy_cursor_jump_to(struct window_pane *wp)
2194{
2195 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2196 struct screen *back_s = data->backing;
2197 struct grid_cell gc;
2198 u_int px, py, xx;
2199
2200 px = data->cx + 2;
2201 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
2202 xx = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2203
2204 while (px < xx) {
2205 grid_get_cell(back_s->grid, px, py, &gc);
2206 if (!(gc.flags & GRID_FLAG_PADDING) &&
2207 gc.data.size == 1 && *gc.data.data == data->jumpchar) {
2208 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px - 1, data->cy);
2209 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2210 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2211 return;
2212 }
2213 px++;
2214 }
2215}
2216
2217static void
2218window_copy_cursor_jump_to_back(struct window_pane *wp)
2219{
2220 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2221 struct screen *back_s = data->backing;
2222 struct grid_cell gc;
2223 u_int px, py;
2224
2225 px = data->cx;
2226 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
2227
2228 if (px > 0)
2229 px--;
2230
2231 if (px > 0)
2232 px--;
2233
2234 for (;;) {
2235 grid_get_cell(back_s->grid, px, py, &gc);
2236 if (!(gc.flags & GRID_FLAG_PADDING) &&
2237 gc.data.size == 1 && *gc.data.data == data->jumpchar) {
2238 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px + 1, data->cy);
2239 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2240 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2241 return;
2242 }
2243 if (px == 0)
2244 break;
2245 px--;
2246 }
2247}
2248
2249static void
2250window_copy_cursor_next_word(struct window_pane *wp, const char *separators)
2251{
2252 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2253 struct screen *back_s = data->backing;
2254 u_int px, py, xx, yy;
2255 int expected = 0;
2256
2257 px = data->cx;
2258 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
2259 xx = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2260 yy = screen_hsize(back_s) + screen_size_y(back_s) - 1;
2261
2262 /*
2263 * First skip past any nonword characters and then any word characters.
2264 *
2265 * expected is initially set to 0 for the former and then 1 for the
2266 * latter.
2267 */
2268 do {
2269 while (px > xx ||
2270 window_copy_in_set(wp, px, py, separators) == expected) {
2271 /* Move down if we're past the end of the line. */
2272 if (px > xx) {
2273 if (py == yy)
2274 return;
2275 window_copy_cursor_down(wp, 0);
2276 px = 0;
2277
2278 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
2279 xx = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2280 } else
2281 px++;
2282 }
2283 expected = !expected;
2284 } while (expected == 1);
2285
2286 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px, data->cy);
2287 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2288 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2289}
2290
2291static void
2292window_copy_cursor_next_word_end(struct window_pane *wp,
2293 const char *separators)
2294{
2295 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2296 struct options *oo = wp->window->options;
2297 struct screen *back_s = data->backing;
2298 u_int px, py, xx, yy;
2299 int keys, expected = 1;
2300
2301 px = data->cx;
2302 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
2303 xx = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2304 yy = screen_hsize(back_s) + screen_size_y(back_s) - 1;
2305
2306 keys = options_get_number(oo, "mode-keys");
2307 if (keys == MODEKEY_VI && !window_copy_in_set(wp, px, py, separators))
2308 px++;
2309
2310 /*
2311 * First skip past any word characters, then any nonword characters.
2312 *
2313 * expected is initially set to 1 for the former and then 0 for the
2314 * latter.
2315 */
2316 do {
2317 while (px > xx ||
2318 window_copy_in_set(wp, px, py, separators) == expected) {
2319 /* Move down if we're past the end of the line. */
2320 if (px > xx) {
2321 if (py == yy)
2322 return;
2323 window_copy_cursor_down(wp, 0);
2324 px = 0;
2325
2326 py = screen_hsize(back_s) + data->cy - data->oy;
2327 xx = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2328 } else
2329 px++;
2330 }
2331 expected = !expected;
2332 } while (expected == 0);
2333
2334 if (keys == MODEKEY_VI && px != 0)
2335 px--;
2336
2337 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px, data->cy);
2338 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2339 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2340}
2341
2342/* Move to the previous place where a word begins. */
2343static void
2344window_copy_cursor_previous_word(struct window_pane *wp,
2345 const char *separators)
2346{
2347 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2348 u_int px, py;
2349
2350 px = data->cx;
2351 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
2352
2353 /* Move back to the previous word character. */
2354 for (;;) {
2355 if (px > 0) {
2356 px--;
2357 if (!window_copy_in_set(wp, px, py, separators))
2358 break;
2359 } else {
2360 if (data->cy == 0 &&
2361 (screen_hsize(data->backing) == 0 ||
2362 data->oy >= screen_hsize(data->backing) - 1))
2363 goto out;
2364 window_copy_cursor_up(wp, 0);
2365
2366 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
2367 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2368 }
2369 }
2370
2371 /* Move back to the beginning of this word. */
2372 while (px > 0 && !window_copy_in_set(wp, px - 1, py, separators))
2373 px--;
2374
2375out:
2376 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px, data->cy);
2377 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2378 window_copy_redraw_lines(wp, data->cy, 1);
2379}
2380
2381static void
2382window_copy_scroll_up(struct window_pane *wp, u_int ny)
2383{
2384 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2385 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
2386 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
2387
2388 if (data->oy < ny)
2389 ny = data->oy;
2390 if (ny == 0)
2391 return;
2392 data->oy -= ny;
2393
2394 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 0);
2395
2396 screen_write_start(&ctx, wp, NULL);
2397 screen_write_cursormove(&ctx, 0, 0);
2398 screen_write_deleteline(&ctx, ny, 8);
2399 window_copy_write_lines(wp, &ctx, screen_size_y(s) - ny, ny);
2400 window_copy_write_line(wp, &ctx, 0);
2401 if (screen_size_y(s) > 1)
2402 window_copy_write_line(wp, &ctx, 1);
2403 if (screen_size_y(s) > 3)
2404 window_copy_write_line(wp, &ctx, screen_size_y(s) - 2);
2405 if (s->sel != NULL && screen_size_y(s) > ny)
2406 window_copy_write_line(wp, &ctx, screen_size_y(s) - ny - 1);
2407 screen_write_cursormove(&ctx, data->cx, data->cy);
2408 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
2409}
2410
2411static void
2412window_copy_scroll_down(struct window_pane *wp, u_int ny)
2413{
2414 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2415 struct screen *s = &data->screen;
2416 struct screen_write_ctx ctx;
2417
2418 if (ny > screen_hsize(data->backing))
2419 return;
2420
2421 if (data->oy > screen_hsize(data->backing) - ny)
2422 ny = screen_hsize(data->backing) - data->oy;
2423 if (ny == 0)
2424 return;
2425 data->oy += ny;
2426
2427 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 0);
2428
2429 screen_write_start(&ctx, wp, NULL);
2430 screen_write_cursormove(&ctx, 0, 0);
2431 screen_write_insertline(&ctx, ny, 8);
2432 window_copy_write_lines(wp, &ctx, 0, ny);
2433 if (s->sel != NULL && screen_size_y(s) > ny)
2434 window_copy_write_line(wp, &ctx, ny);
2435 else if (ny == 1) /* nuke position */
2436 window_copy_write_line(wp, &ctx, 1);
2437 screen_write_cursormove(&ctx, data->cx, data->cy);
2438 screen_write_stop(&ctx);
2439}
2440
2441void
2442window_copy_add_formats(struct window_pane *wp, struct format_tree *ft)
2443{
2444 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2445
2446 if (wp->mode != &window_copy_mode)
2447 return;
2448
2449 format_add(ft, "selection_present", "%d", data->screen.sel != NULL);
2450 format_add(ft, "scroll_position", "%d", data->oy);
2451 format_add(ft, "rectangle_toggle", "%d", data->rectflag);
2452}
2453
2454static void
2455window_copy_rectangle_toggle(struct window_pane *wp)
2456{
2457 struct window_copy_mode_data *data = wp->modedata;
2458 u_int px, py;
2459
2460 data->rectflag = !data->rectflag;
2461
2462 py = screen_hsize(data->backing) + data->cy - data->oy;
2463 px = window_copy_find_length(wp, py);
2464 if (data->cx > px)
2465 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, px, data->cy);
2466
2467 window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1);
2468 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
2469}
2470
2471static void
2472window_copy_move_mouse(struct mouse_event *m)
2473{
2474 struct window_pane *wp;
2475 u_int x, y;
2476
2477 wp = cmd_mouse_pane(m, NULL, NULL);
2478 if (wp == NULL || wp->mode != &window_copy_mode)
2479 return;
2480
2481 if (cmd_mouse_at(wp, m, &x, &y, 0) != 0)
2482 return;
2483
2484 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, x, y);
2485}
2486
2487void
2488window_copy_start_drag(struct client *c, struct mouse_event *m)
2489{
2490 struct window_pane *wp;
2491 u_int x, y;
2492
2493 if (c == NULL)
2494 return;
2495
2496 wp = cmd_mouse_pane(m, NULL, NULL);
2497 if (wp == NULL || wp->mode != &window_copy_mode)
2498 return;
2499
2500 if (cmd_mouse_at(wp, m, &x, &y, 1) != 0)
2501 return;
2502
2503 c->tty.mouse_drag_update = window_copy_drag_update;
2504 c->tty.mouse_drag_release = NULL; /* will fire MouseDragEnd key */
2505
2506 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, x, y);
2507 window_copy_start_selection(wp);
2508 window_copy_redraw_screen(wp);
2509}
2510
2511static void
2512window_copy_drag_update(__unused struct client *c, struct mouse_event *m)
2513{
2514 struct window_pane *wp;
2515 struct window_copy_mode_data *data;
2516 u_int x, y, old_cy;
2517
2518 wp = cmd_mouse_pane(m, NULL, NULL);
2519 if (wp == NULL || wp->mode != &window_copy_mode)
2520 return;
2521 data = wp->modedata;
2522
2523 if (cmd_mouse_at(wp, m, &x, &y, 0) != 0)
2524 return;
2525 old_cy = data->cy;
2526
2527 window_copy_update_cursor(wp, x, y);
2528 if (window_copy_update_selection(wp, 1))
2529 window_copy_redraw_selection(wp, old_cy);
2530}
